# OS

> Standard library OS utilities.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var ns = require( '@stdlib/os' );
```

#### ns

Standard library OS utilities.

```javascript
var os = ns;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
console.log( getKeys( ns ) );
```
